content: वीचिः {%<ab>m.</ab>%} {%<ab>f.</ab>%} वीची [<ls>Uṇ. 4. 72</ls>] {@--1@} A wave; समुद्रवीचीव चलस्वभावाः <ls>Pt. 1. 194</ls>; <ls>U. 3. 2</ls>; <ls>R. 6. 56.</ls> <ls n="R.">12. 100</ls>, <ls>Me. 28.</ls> {@--2@} Inconstancy, thoughtlessness. {@--3@} Pleasure, delight. {@--4@} Rest, leisure. {@--5@} A ray of light. {@--6@} Little.
